text: Mohamad Jumaily is a Syrian-Canadian entrepreneur. He started Mr. Calzone, a chain of restaurants in Winnipeg, Manitoba. He is also involved in Winnipeg's Muslim community and charity work. == Mr. Calzone == Jumaily opened the first Mr. Calzone restaurant in 2011 in Downtown Winnipeg. The restaurant serves calzones, pizza, shawarma, and other food. The chain has five locations in Winnipeg. == Community Work == Jumaily served as President of the Syrian Assembly of Manitoba from 2019 to 2021. He participated in fundraising events for earthquake relief in Syria and Turkey. == Speaking == Jumaily has made public statements about the war in Yemen and earthquakes in Syria and Turkey. He has discussed media coverage of different conflicts. == References == Category:Restaurateurs Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mohamad Jumaily
